# isBound

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the flow has a binding to a specific interface.

## Declaration

```swift
var isBound: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

When a binding exists, this value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], and the [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEAppProxyFlow/networkInterface] property indicates the bound interface. If the flow isn’t bound to an interface, this value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Accessing flow information

- **metaData**: A metadata object containing information about the source app of the flow.
- **setMetadata(_:)**: Sets the flow’s metadata for use by proxy providers.
- **nw_parameters_t**: An object that stores the protocols to use for connections, options for sending data, and network path constraints.
- **networkInterface**: The network interface, if any, used by this flow.
- **nw_interface_type_t**: Types of network interfaces, based on their link layer media types.
- **remoteHostname**: The remote host name for flows created from a hostname.
